actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To require the National Park Service to make necessary safety improvements to the Statue of Liberty and to fully reopen the Statue to the public.
short_title: Save the Statue of Liberty Act

summary.text: Save the Statue of Liberty Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the National Park Service (NPS) and using funds available to the Secretary for this purpose, to commence necessary safety and related improvements to the Statue of Liberty so that it may be fully reopened to the public to provide the same access as before September 11, 2001.

titles.title: Save the Statue of Liberty Act
To require the National Park Service to make necessary safety improvements to the Statue of Liberty and to fully reopen the Statue to the public.
